abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn shot back again at Lions Gate Entertainment on Monday for rejecting his $6-a-share takeover offer, saying that the bid was a fair price and that the only reason that the company’s stock is trading above $6 is because of him.

lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn shot back again at Lions Gate Entertainment on Monday for rejecting his $6-a-share takeover offer, telling Reuters that the bid was a fair price and that the only reason that the movie studio’s stock has been trading above $6 was because of him.

headline.main: Icahn Defends His Lions Gate Bid as Fair
